topic.title: The Pirate Sea - A resilient, locally run torrent index and database
topic.body:
Ahoy! We be pleased t' announce the official launch o' The Pirate Sea, a resilient, locally run torrent index 'n database. 

Wit' The Pirate Sea ye'll 'ave access t' thousands o' curated torrents containin' o'er 30TB worth o' content, completely free 'n searchable on wit' no internet connection!

We be changin' the torrent ecosystem 'n we be love t' 'ave ye join us. We played around wit' hostin' on ZeroNet but due t' lack o' support fer large files, we decided t' jus' zip the whole index up into 2MB pieces 'n distribute it that way on ZN. 

Visit our ZeroNet instance 'n download the optional files or download th' latest torrent!


http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PirateC2x3r4j1EsYnT4eGKtFAMP2N7LV
http://thepiratesea.org

1630276094_13K9xAHRgqygKe8PQ7bgoNxVu6zhj.body:
> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_45_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): Set the viewport on your ZeroNet version of the site in content.json [...]

Done!

> [robione](#comment_665_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): Where's the search?

Arrrrrgh! The search currently be a work in progress. As o' right now, ye load thepiratesea_master.txt 'n ctrl + F search keywords. Eventually, the plan be t' dump the contents o' that file into a sqlite database 'n create a full featured search.

Our cap'n ain't the best developer, he focuses more on the archivin' side o' things, but we 'ave lots o' big plans fer this project! If anyone likes the vision 'n be interested in helpin' out, we be definitely lookin' fer volunteers!

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1101_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): hard to understand to me. the torrent file contains the html based site which shows/contains list of 10 000 .torrent files which contains various data. I see no purpose to have this not speaking about downloading data of these torrents, no search.

You can search thepiratesea_master.txt manually via ctrl+F.

> [robione](#comment_666_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): How about you link that file from the main page with those instructions?It doesn't appear to exist in /

I haven't written a proper documentation up yet, sorry

1630522157_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: Robots or the same scitzo making numerous accounts?

yarrrrrrrrrrr!
